name: HKActivitySummaryQuery
desc: A query for reading activity summary objects from the HealthKit store.

items.desc: Initializes a new active summary query.

items.name: var updateHandler: ((HKActivitySummaryQuery, [HKActivitySummary]?, Error?) -> Void)?
items.desc: The handler for monitoring updates to activity summaries saved in the HealthKit store.
